Project Details: The project is tracking the usage of all the expenses in the hotel industry. It shows the client performance over different metrics with real time MTD & YTD data cut. It help hotels to analyze their expenses, staff performance, complaints handling etc.

· Involved in the database management, creating queries for dashboard development.
· Involved in Daily and Weekly project meeting with owner for understanding requirement.

C2C provides its customers a view of their material while it is in the shipping pipeline. This project is based on providing 24*7 support to all users of C2C globally including but not limited to server maintenance, build deployments, monitoring business critical applications, fixing application functionality related issues raised by customers worldwide.
